raw_body: DE SILVA – NIHAL – Beloved husband of Ranmalie,​ ever loving father of Jamila (Sunpower Systems),​ Aroshanie (UAE) and Danesh (JTS Freight – USA),​ father-in-law of Pandula (KD Constructions),​ Melvin (Emirates,​ UAE) and Anuki (Cambio),​ grandfather of Niyesa,​ Dhaksha,​ Lithuli,​ Michael (UAE),​ Mark (UAE),​ Diyenka and Melora (UAE). Remains lie at residence No. 50/​26,​ Thotupola Road,​ Amunupitiya Watte,​ Welisara,​ Ragama. Cortege leaves the residence at 2.30 p.m. on Saturday the 2nd of September and burial at 4.00 p.m. at Madampitiya Cemetery (Roman Catholic Section).055294
